Text:
Follow these:
1) Install tuneup.
2) extract the crack.rar file with winrar.
3) copy all the files from the crack folder and paste them into the installed tuneup folder (by default it is C:\Program Files\TuneUp Utilities 2011) ...u will get a warning ...click overwrite the files.(it is necessary that u get this warning)
4) open the registration.reg file and import it into the registry..

Im delighted that adnan1102 sid its updateable, I've been trying to get one that updates for almost a year now , and each time it always knows its not an original key, so lets see what happens and thanks for a good clean upload

Just a question for certainty, hope someone can answer: i already have installed TU 2010 and did loads of tweaks with it. Can I install this 2011 version over my old 2010 version or do I first have to uninstall the 2010 version? And what about my tweaks like self-made icon-pack - other boot and login screen etc.....  all gone after uninstalling 2010 I guess? ......

Installed and activated correctly and worked fine after a restart. 

@clubkilla

I had a previous version which i uninstalled and then installed this one and my settings/tweaks were all saved.

Keep up the good work adnan1102, will seed 200%.
Don't update this, it'll revert to a trial if you do.
